author: Jennifer Bray, Fiach Kelly
title: Extra coronavirus checks on citizens returning to Ireland mooted
description: Health specialist says Ireland ‘squandering’ its geographical advantage as an island with different virus approaches North and South
content:
Extra checks on citizens returning to Ireland from abroad are under consideration by senior officials in the Department of Health to deal with the coronavirus crisis.
Taoiseach Leo Varadkar said that while Ireland would not be closing its borders, the Nation… [+2163 chars]
